shortFormVideos.title: Core concepts
shortFormVideos.shortDescription: Review key concepts for developing on the Roku platform.
shortFormVideos.longDescription: Review key concepts for developing on the Roku platform. This lesson explains the basic design principles and key concepts of Roku development, provide an overview of Roku's development platform, and review the contents and structure of Roku channels. You'll learn about: SceneGraph and BrightScript, the different types of components you can use to build your channel UI, and many other topics. When you are done with this lesson, you will be ready to start working on your first Roku channel!
